name: TableColumnCountToBeBetween
description: This schema defines the test TableColumnCountToBeBetween. Test the number of columns to be between min max value.

parameterDefinition.name: minColValue
parameterDefinition.description: Expected number of columns should be greater than or equal to {minValue}. If minValue is not included, maxValue is treated as upperBound and there will be no minimum number of column

parameterDefinition.name: maxColValue
parameterDefinition.description: Expected number of columns should be less than or equal to {maxValue}. If maxValue is not included, minValue is treated as lowerBound and there will be no maximum number of column
